description:
Tape for those riders who go out no matter the weather. You ask a lot from your handlebar tape, and this tape delivers. Cannondale’s KnurlTack bar tape blends comfort and durability, topped off with a tacky all weather finish.

  • 3mm-thick tape with a QuellGel silicone layer that absorbs and dampens vibrations
  • Knurled pattern provides grip in all weather
  • Expanding bar end plugs included
name: Cannondale KnurlTack Handlebar Tape
